title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 23 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 23 2021
description:
Clay and Buck welcome a liberal to the show. David Zweig of New York Magazine talks about his new blockbuster article: The Science of Masking Kids at School Remains Uncertain. Science is about debate. We never beat this lockdown monster by feeding it more of our freedom. It doesn't work. It just gets hungrier. Biden urges private sector to discriminate against the unvaccinated. To deal with disaster in Afghanistan, Kamala heads to Vietnam. Buck talks about his brother's wedding.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
